text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal. It is the courage to continue that counts. Winston Churchill's words remind us of perseverance.
In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on. Robert Frost captured the essence of resilience.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle for anything less.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving forward. Even through the toughest times, momentum is key.
Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire. It's about inspiring minds to think differently and explore.
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today. Focus on what you can control and let go of what you cannot.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it. Hard work and dedication often lead to unexpected rewards.
Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life. Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra effort you put in every single day of your journey.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. Dream big, work hard, and stay focused on your goals.
